definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: He tossed over, as he spoke, a crumpled sheet of foreign notepaper.
sentences.chinese: 說話間，他把一張皺巴巴的外國紙片扔了過來。

sentences.english: Then, reaching under his pillow, he pulled out some more crumpled up bills.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他伸手到枕頭下摸出幾張皺皺巴巴的鈔票。

sentences.english: Walking around all wrinkled and creased sends a message of laziness.
sentences.chinese: 穿着皺皺巴巴的衣服，說明你很懶。

sentences.english: One man lighted a crack pipe, inhaling deeply.
sentences.chinese: 一名男子點燃皺巴巴的香菸，深深地吸着。

sentences.english: We are poppy, going out into the world , all rumpled.
sentences.chinese: 就像罌粟花般，我們皺巴巴地來到這世界。

sentences.english: I found a crumpled tear-stained sheet stuffed in the back of his desk, an English paper.
sentences.chinese: 我在他桌子深處找到一張皺巴巴的滿是淚跡的紙。

sentences.english: She flattened out the crumpled letter on the desk.
sentences.chinese: 她在寫字檯上把皺巴巴的信展平。

sentences.english: A pile of crushed cushions remained to show where Illyrio had sprawled.
sentences.chinese: 一堆皺皺巴巴的靠枕依稀辨得出伊利里歐曾經的碾壓。

sentences.english: She held a large, crumpled plastic bag in her arms.
sentences.chinese: 她懷裏抱着一個皺皺巴巴的大塑料袋。

sentences.english: His eyes focused now on a crumpled flyer on his bedside table.
sentences.chinese: 這時他的目光匯聚到牀頭櫃上一頁皺皺巴巴的宣傳單。

sentences.english: His face creased up and the vacant blue eyes clouded over.
sentences.chinese: 他的臉皺巴巴的，空洞的藍眼睛佈滿了烏雲。

definition: to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
erhua variant of 一股腦|一股脑[yi1 gu3 nao3]
felt-tip pen/roller ball pen/gel ink pen
